meanings: [명사] donation, contribution, (정기적인) subscription, [동사] donate (to), contribute (to/toward), subscribe (to)

vlive.korean: 기부를 했습니다. we donated it. 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : #2019 #밤황치열시 #part.17 #DJ황치열
모두 기부한다고 말씀을 드렸었고. I told you that I'd be donating them. 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : #2019 #밤황치열시 #part.17 #DJ황치열
vlive.english: I told you that I'd be donating them.

vlive.korean: [이들의 기부 FLEX 과연 어디까지?] [Where is the limit of their donation FLEX?] View video Dingo Freestyle / 딩고프리스타일 : [DAMOIM] EP.7 4천만원 '기부' 플렉싱! 근데 이게 끝이 아니라고...? 묻고 더블로 가! ㅣ둘도 없는 힙합 친구 : 다모임ㅣDingo Freestyle
vlive.english: [Where is the limit of their donation FLEX?]

vlive.korean: 중국... 한국 측 것은 잘 기부가 되었어요. But China... The Korea side was donated well. 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : #2019 #밤황치열시 #part.17 #DJ황치열
vlive.english: But China... The Korea side was donated well.

vlive.korean: 형이 이거를 너한테 기부하려고 산 줄 알아? Do you think I bought this to donate this to you? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 집가기시룬🐖🐇
vlive.english: Do you think I bought this to donate this to you?

examples.korean: They are very generous givers to charity. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 자선단체에 아주 후한 기부자들이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
